title: the Lithic Vanguard
intro: When the Primordial Dragon fell, its soul was shattered into six fragments of avatars that would later be referred to as the Dragon Knights, or the Draconis siblings. Terros is the second sibling, wielding the elemental power of earth and metal. He spends most of his time at the bastion, which he built all on his own over decades. He believes his primary duty of the siblings is not only to rule their people with an iron fist, but also to protect them with an iron wall.

abilities.name: Heavy Weight
abilities.details:
Terros is permanently [bf]immune[/] to all slow effects.

However, all of his bonus movement speed is converted into bonus [ar]physical resistance[/] instead.

abilities.name: Quake Slam
abilities.details:
Terros slams his twin maces in 2 straight lines, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ar]physical resistance[/]) to all enemies hit and briefly [db]slowing[/] them.

In Earth Dragon form, Terros slams his massive claws in a wide cone, dealing increased [ad]physical damage[/] and [db]stunning[/] the enemies instead.

abilities.name: Lithic Aegis
abilities.details:
Terros hardens his scales into a dense crystalline shell, gaining a [sh]shield[/] that absorbs incoming damage for a duration.

While the shield is active, Terros stores a percentage of the damage he takes (maximum limit based on his [ar]physical resistance[/]). When the shield is destroyed or expires, it shatters, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ar]physical resistance[/]) plus the damage stored during the absorption phase.

In Earth Dragon form, the [bf]shield strength[/] and [bf]absorption limit[/] are increased.

abilities.name: Tremor Challenge
abilities.details:
Terros strikes his maces together, creating a localised vibration that [db]taunts[/] a single target enemy hero for a short duration, forcing them to attack him.

In Earth Dragon form, the vibration is replaced with a tremor in a circle around Terros, taunting all nearby enemies instead.

abilities.name: Tectonic Breaker
abilities.details:
Terros transforms into the Earth Dragon, gaining increased [bf]size[/], [bf]attack range[/] and [ar]physical resistance[/].

Upon activation, Terros releases a massive seismic shockwave, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ar]physical resistance[/]) to all enemies hit and slightly [db]knocking[/] them towards himself.

While in Earth Dragon form, his abilities are enhanced.
